entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
